1.1.name: wordpress/thank-me-later
1.1.description:
Thank Me Later sends 'thank you' emails to your commenters. Simply write a message thanking commenters for reading your blog and it will be sent at a time of your choosing -- after 5 minutes, a day, a month, whenever!

Latest Update (3.0.6): Fix memory exhaustion issue.

Invite readers back to your blog

Thank Me Later has the power to attract readers back to your blog and encourages them to further engage with discussion. More sophisticated uses of the plugin include:

  • Inviting the commenter to subscribe to your RSS feed;
  • Asking them to join you on Twitter, Facebook or LinkedIn; and
  • Providing them a discount on a subsequent purchase.

Features

  • HTML emails: simply write your email using plaintext and it is automatically transformed into a beautiful HTML email.
  • Shortcodes: use shortcodes such as [name] and [comment] to make
